sentences.zh: 太史公讀春秋歷譜諜，至周厲王，未嘗不廢書而嘆也。

translations.text: Sima Qian read the Spring and Autumn Annals and various historical records. When he reached King Li of Zhou, he could not help but put down his book and sigh.
He said: "Alas, Master Ji foresaw this!"
When King Zhou used ivory chopsticks, Jizi sighed.

sentences.zh: 周道缺，詩人本之衽席，關雎作。

translations.text: The Way of Zhou declined, and poets took it as their theme in their songs. Thus the "Guan Ju" was composed.
When benevolence and righteousness declined, the "Lu Ming" criticized it.

sentences.zh: 及至厲王，以惡聞其過，公卿懼誅而禍作，厲王遂奔于彘，亂自京師始，而共和行政焉。

translations.text: When King Li came to the throne, because he hated to hear about his faults, the nobles feared execution and disaster arose. King Li fled to Zhi, and chaos began in the capital, with the Gonghe administration taking power.

sentences.zh: 是後或力政，彊乘弱，興師不請天子。

translations.text: After this, some used force to govern, the strong oppressed the weak, and they raised armies without asking the Son of Heaven.

sentences.zh: 然挾王室之義，以討伐為會盟主，政由五伯，諸侯恣行，淫侈不軌，賊臣篡子滋起矣。

translations.text: However, they wielded the righteousness of the royal house to use conquest as a means to become lords of alliances. Government was by the Five Hegemons, the feudal lords acted wantonly, indulged in extravagance and immorality, and traitorous ministers and usurping sons multiplied.

sentences.zh: 齊、晉、秦、楚其在成周微甚，封或百里或五十里。

translations.text: Qi, Jin, Qin, and Chu were very weak during the Chengzhou period, their fiefs being only one hundred li or fifty li.

sentences.zh: 晉阻三河，齊負東海，楚介江淮，秦因雍州之固，四海迭興，更為伯主，文武所褒大封，皆威而服焉。

translations.text: Jin blocked the three rivers, Qi faced the Eastern Sea, Chu lay between the Jiang and Huai, Qin relied on the defenses of Yong province. The four seas successively rose up, taking turns to become hegemonic lords. The great enfeoffments praised by Wen and Wu were all awe-inspiring and submissive.

sentences.zh: 是以孔子明王道，干七十餘君，莫能用，故西觀周室，論史記舊聞，興於魯而次春秋，上記隱，下至哀之獲麟，約其辭文，去其煩重，以制義法，王道備，人事浹。

translations.text: Therefore Confucius clarified the king's way, petitioned more than seventy rulers, but none could employ him. So he looked west to the Zhou court, discussed the old traditions in the historical records, arose in Lu and arranged the Spring and Autumn Annals. Above he records Yin, below he reaches Ai's capture of the unicorn, condensing its wording and style, removing its tedious repetitions, to establish righteous principles. The king's way was complete, human affairs were harmonious.

sentences.zh: 七十子之徒口受其傳指，為有所刺譏褒諱挹損之文辭不可以書見也。

translations.text: The disciples of the seventy followers received the transmissions orally, for there were satirical, critical, praising, euphemistic, and diminishing words that could not be written down.

sentences.zh: 魯君子左丘明懼弟子人人異端，各安其意，失其真，故因孔子史記具論其語，成左氏春秋。

translations.text: The Lu gentleman Zuo Qiuming feared that his disciples would each establish different doctrines, each secure in their own opinions, losing the truth. So he comprehensively discussed Confucius's historical records and compiled the Zuo's Spring and Autumn Annals.

sentences.zh: 鐸椒為楚威王傳，為王不能盡觀春秋，采取成敗，卒四十章，為鐸氏微。

translations.text: Duo Jiao wrote a commentary for King Wei of Chu. Since the king could not completely study the Spring and Autumn Annals, he selected successes and failures, finally making forty chapters, becoming the Duo family's minor commentary.

sentences.zh: 趙孝成王時，其相虞卿上采春秋，下觀近勢，亦著八篇，為虞氏春秋。

translations.text: During King Xiaocheng of Zhao's time, his chancellor Yu Qing collected from the Spring and Autumn Annals above and observed recent trends below, also writing eight chapters, becoming the Yu's Spring and Autumn Annals.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋者，秦莊襄王相，亦上觀尚古，刪拾春秋，集六國時事，以為八覽、六論、十二紀，為呂氏春秋。

translations.text: Lü Buwei was chancellor to King Zhuangxiang of Qin. He also looked up to honor antiquity, collected and selected from the Spring and Autumn Annals, gathered events from the six states, making eight surveys, six discussions, twelve annals, becoming the Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals.

sentences.zh: 及如荀卿、孟子、公孫固、韓非之徒，各往往捃摭春秋之文以著書，不同勝紀。

translations.text: And like Xun Qing, Mengzi, Gongsun Gu, Han Fei and others, each gathered and selected from the Spring and Autumn Annals' texts to write books, differing greatly.

sentences.zh: 漢相張蒼歷譜五德，上大夫董仲舒推春秋義，頗著文焉。

translations.text: The Han chancellor Zhang Cang calendared the five virtues, and the imperial censor Dong Zhongshu expounded the Spring and Autumn Annals' meanings, writing quite extensively on them.

Sima Qian read the Spring and Autumn Annals and various historical records. When he reached King Li of Zhou, he could not help but put down his book and sigh. He said: "Alas, Master Ji foresaw this!" When King Zhou used ivory chopsticks, Jizi sighed. The Way of Zhou declined, and poets took it as their theme in their songs. Thus the "Guan Ju" was composed. When benevolence and righteousness declined, the "Lu Ming" criticized it. When King Li came to the throne, because he hated to hear about his faults, the nobles feared execution and disaster arose. King Li fled to Zhi, and chaos began in the capital, with the Gonghe administration taking power. After this, some used force to govern, the strong oppressed the weak, and they raised armies without asking the Son of Heaven. However, they wielded the righteousness of the royal house to use conquest as a means to become lords of alliances. Government was by the Five Hegemons, the feudal lords acted wantonly, indulged in extravagance and immorality, and traitorous ministers and usurping sons multiplied. Qi, Jin, Qin, and Chu were very weak during the Chengzhou period, their fiefs being only one hundred li or fifty li. Jin blocked the three rivers, Qi faced the Eastern Sea, Chu lay between the Jiang and Huai, Qin relied on the defenses of Yong province. The four seas successively rose up, taking turns to become hegemonic lords. The great enfeoffments praised by Wen and Wu were all awe-inspiring and submissive. Therefore Confucius clarified the king's way, petitioned more than seventy rulers, but none could employ him. So he looked west to the Zhou court, discussed the old traditions in the historical records, arose in Lu and arranged the Spring and Autumn Annals. Above he records Yin, below he reaches Ai's capture of the unicorn, condensing its wording and style, removing its tedious repetitions, to establish righteous principles. The king's way was complete, human affairs were harmonious. The disciples of the seventy followers received the transmissions orally, for there were satirical, critical, praising, euphemistic, and diminishing words that could not be written down. The Lu gentleman Zuo Qiuming feared that his disciples would each establish different doctrines, each secure in their own opinions, losing the truth. So he comprehensively discussed Confucius's historical records and compiled the Zuo's Spring and Autumn Annals. Duo Jiao wrote a commentary for King Wei of Chu. Since the king could not completely study the Spring and Autumn Annals, he selected successes and failures, finally making forty chapters, becoming the Duo family's minor commentary. During King Xiaocheng of Zhao's time, his chancellor Yu Qing collected from the Spring and Autumn Annals above and observed recent trends below, also writing eight chapters, becoming the Yu's Spring and Autumn Annals. Lü Buwei was chancellor to King Zhuangxiang of Qin. He also looked up to honor antiquity, collected and selected from the Spring and Autumn Annals, gathered events from the six states, making eight surveys, six discussions, twelve annals, becoming the Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals. And like Xun Qing, Mengzi, Gongsun Gu, Han Fei and others, each gathered and selected from the Spring and Autumn Annals' texts to write books, differing greatly. The Han chancellor Zhang Cang calendared the five virtues, and the imperial censor Dong Zhongshu expounded the Spring and Autumn Annals' meanings, writing quite extensively on them.
Before Christ

cells.content: 四周公欲殺王而立子克，王誅周公，克奔燕。
cells.translation: Year 4: Zhou Gong wanted to kill the king and establish Zi Ke; the king executed Zhou Gong; Ke fled to Yan.
Lu Zhuang Gong Tong, first year
Zheng Zi Ying, first year. Zi Mian's younger brother.
692 BC

cells.content: 陳宣公杵臼元年杵臼，莊公弟。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Xuan of Chen (Chu Jiu): Chu Jiu, younger brother of Duke Zhuang.
691 BC
Song Min Gong Jie, first year
690 BC
Year 8: Attacked Ji and destroyed its capital cities.

cells.content: 五十一王伐，隨告夫人心動，王卒軍中。
cells.translation: Year 51: The king attacked; Sui reported that the lady's heart moved; the king died in the army.
Yan Zhuang Gong, first year
689 BC
Year 5: Together with Qi attacked Wei and installed Hui Gong.
Year 1 of King Wen of Chu (Zi): First established capital at Ying.
688 BC

cells.content: 二伐申，過鄧，鄧甥曰楚可取，鄧侯不許。
cells.translation: Year 2: Attacked Shen, passed Deng; Deng's nephew said Chu could be taken; Deng Hou did not allow it.
687 BC
Jiawu
Year 7: Stars fell like rain, together with the rain.
Year 10: Qi established Hui Gong; Qian Mu fled to Zhou.
686 BC

cells.content: 八子糾來奔，與管仲俱避毋知亂。
cells.translation: Eighth year: Zi Jiu came fleeing, along with Guan Zhong they avoided the Wu Zhi disorder.
Twelfth year: Wu Zhi killed the ruler and established himself.
Wei Hui Gong Shuo returned to enter. Fourteenth year.
685 BC

cells.content: 九魯欲與糾入，後小白，齊距魯，使生致管仲。
cells.translation: Ninth year: Lu wished to enter with Jiu, came after Xiao Bai; Qi blocked Lu, made them bring Guan Zhong alive.

cells.content: 齊桓公小白元年春，齊殺毋知。
cells.translation: Qi Huan Gong Xiao Bai first year, spring: Qi killed Wu Zhi.
684 BC
Tenth year: Qi attacked us, because of Jiu.

cells.content: 六息夫人，陳女，過蔡，蔡不禮，惡之。楚伐蔡，獲哀侯以歸。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Xi Fu Ren, Chen woman, passed through Cai; Cai was disrespectful to her, she hated them. Chu attacked Cai, captured Ai Hou and returned.
Eleventh year: Chu captured our hou.
683 BC
Eleventh year: Zang Wen Zhong condoled Song's flood.

cells.content: 九宋大水，公自罪。魯使臧文仲來弔。
cells.translation: Ninth year: Song great flood, the duke blamed himself. Lu sent Zang Wen Zhong to condole.
682 BC
Tenth year: Wan killed the ruler; Qiu Mu had righteousness.
681 BC
King Xi, first year

cells.content: 十三曹沫劫桓公。反所亡地。
cells.translation: Thirteenth year: Cao Mo hijacked Huan Gong. Returned the lost territory.
Fifth year: assembled with Lu people at Ke.

cells.content: 宋桓公御說元年莊公子。
cells.translation: Song Huan Gong Yu Shuo first year: Zhuang Gong's son.
680 BC
679 BC
Seventh year: began hegemony, assembled the feudal lords at Juan.

cells.content: 二十八曲沃武公滅晉侯湣，以寶獻周，周命武公為晉君，并其地。
cells.translation: Twenty-eighth year: Qu Wo Wu Gong extinguished Jin Hou Min, offered the treasures to Zhou; Zhou commanded Wu Gong to be Jin's ruler, and combined their territories.

cells.content: 鄭厲公元年厲公亡後十七歲復入。
cells.translation: Zheng Li Gong first year: Li Gong fled and after 17 years returned to enter.
678 BC

cells.content: 晉武公稱并晉，已立三十八年，不更元，因其元年。
cells.translation: Jin Wu Gong established and combined Jin; already established 38 years, did not change the yuan, continued from his first year.
Twentieth year: buried at Yong, first used human sacrifices to follow in death.
Twelfth year: attacked Deng and extinguished it.
Second year: the feudal lords attacked us.
677 BC
Jia Chen.

cells.content: 三十九武公卒，子詭諸立，為獻公。
cells.translation: Thirty-ninth year: Wu Gong died; son Gui Zhu established, as Xian Gong.
Qin De Gong first year: Wu Gong's younger brother.
676 BC
Year 1 of King Hui: Took consort from Chen.
Jin Xian Gong Gui Zhu, first year

cells.content: 二初作伏，祠社，磔狗邑四門。
cells.translation: Second year: first made the Fu sacrifice, sacrificed to the She altar, split dogs at the four gates of the city.
Chu Du Ao Su, first year
675 BC

cells.content: 二燕、衛伐王，王奔溫，立子穨。
cells.translation: Second year: Yan and Wei attacked the king; the king fled to Wen, established Zi Yi.
Qin Xuan Gong, first year
Seventh year: took a Wei woman. Wen Gong's younger brother.

cells.content: 十六伐王，王奔溫，立子穨。
cells.translation: Sixteenth year: attacked the king; the king fled to Wen, established Zi Yi.
674 BC
Cai Mu Hou Xi, first year
Seventeenth year: Zheng seized our Zhong Fu.
673 BC
Fourth year: executed Yi, entered Hui Wang.
Seventh year: rescued Zhou's disorder, entered the king.
672 BC

cells.content: 五太子母早死。惠后生叔帶。
cells.translation: Fifth year: the crown prince's mother died early. Hui Hou gave birth to Shu Dai.

cells.content: 十四陳完自陳來奔，田常始此也。
cells.translation: Fourteenth year: Chen Wan came fleeing from Chen, Tian Chang began from this.
Fifth year: attacked the Li Rong, obtained Ji.
Fourth year: built the Mi altar.
Fifth year: younger brother Yun killed Du Ao and established himself.
Twenty-first year: Li Gong's son Wan fled to Qi.
Zheng Wen Gong Jie, first year
671 BC
Twenty-third year: the duke went to Qi to observe the She sacrifice.
Chu Cheng Wang Yun, first year
670 BC
Cao Xi Gong Yi, first year
669 BC
Eighth year: completely killed the former Jin Hou's various sons.
668 BC
Ninth year: began building Jiang capital city.
Wei Yi Gong Chi, first year
667 BC
Jia Yin.
Tenth year: granted Qi Hou the mandate.
666 BC
665 BC

cells.content: 十二太子申生居曲沃，重耳居蒲城，夷吾居屈。驪姬故。
cells.translation: Twelfth year: Crown Prince Shen resided at Qu Wo, Chong Er resided at Pu City, Yi Wu resided at Qu. Because of Li Ji.
664 BC
663 BC
Twenty-third year: attacked the Shan Rong, for Yan's sake.
Qin Cheng Gong, first year
662 BC

cells.content: 三十二莊公弟叔牙鴆死。慶父弒子般。季友奔陳，立湣公。
cells.translation: Thirty-second year: Zhuang Gong's younger brother Shu Ya was poisoned to death. Qing Fu assassinated Zi Ban. Ji You fled to Chen, established Min Gong.
661 BC
Lu Min Gong Kai, first year

cells.content: 十六滅魏、耿、霍。始封趙夙耿，畢萬魏，始此。
cells.translation: Sixteenth year: extinguished Wei, Geng, Huo. First enfeoffed Zhao Su at Geng, Bi Wan at Wei, began from this.
Cao Zhao Gong, first year
660 BC

cells.content: 二慶父殺湣公。季友自陳立申，為釐公。殺慶父。
cells.translation: Second year: Qing Fu killed Min Gong. Ji You from Chen established Shen as Xi Gong. Killed Qing Fu.

cells.content: 十七申生將軍，君子知其廢。
cells.translation: Seventeenth year: Shen Sheng was general; the noblemen knew he would be discarded.

cells.content: 翟伐我。公好鶴，士不戰，滅我國。國怨，惠公亂，滅其後，更立黔牟弟。衛戴公元年
cells.translation: Di attacked us. The duke was fond of cranes; the soldiers did not fight, extinguished our state. The state resented it; Hui Gong created disorder, extinguished his descendants, instead established Qian Mou's younger brother. Wei Dai Gong first year.
659 BC

cells.content: 魯釐公申元年哀姜喪自齊至。
cells.translation: Lu Xi Gong Shen first year: Ai Jiang's mourning came from Qi.

cells.content: 二十七殺女弟魯莊公夫人，淫故。
cells.translation: Twenty-seventh year: killed younger sister Lu Zhuang Gong's consort, because of licentiousness.
Qin Mu Gong Ren Hao, first year

cells.content: 衛文公燬元年戴公弟也。
cells.translation: Wei Wen Gong Hui first year: Dai Gong's younger brother.
658 BC

cells.content: 二十八為衛築楚丘。救戎狄伐。
cells.translation: Year 28: Built Chu Qiu for Wei. Saved from Rong Di attacks.

cells.content: 十九荀息以幣假道于虞以伐虢，滅下陽。
cells.translation: Year 19: Xun Xi used currency to borrow passage through Yu to attack Guo, destroyed Xia Yang.

cells.content: 二齊桓公率諸侯為我城楚丘。
cells.translation: Year 2: Qi Huan Gong led the feudal lords to build Chu Qiu for us.
657 BC
Jiazi

cells.content: 二十九與蔡姬共舟，蕩公，公怒，歸蔡姬。
cells.translation: Year 29: Together with Cai Ji in the same boat, rocked the duke; the duke was angry and returned Cai Ji.
Year 18: Because of the woman's matter, Qi attacked us.
Yan Xiang Gong, first year
656 BC

cells.content: 三十率諸侯伐蔡，蔡潰，遂伐楚，責包茅貢。
cells.translation: Year 30: Led the feudal lords to attack Cai; Cai collapsed, then attacked Chu and demanded tribute of bundled mugwort.

cells.content: 二十一申生以驪姬讒自殺。重耳奔蒲，夷吾奔屈。
cells.translation: Year 21: Shen Sheng killed himself because of Li Ji's slander. Chong Er fled to Pu; Yi Wu fled to Qu.
Year 4: Welcomed the bride from Jin.

cells.content: 十六齊伐我，至陘，使屈完盟。
cells.translation: Year 16: Qi attacked us, reached Xing, sent Qu Wan to make alliance.
655 BC

cells.content: 二十二滅虞、虢。重耳奔狄。
cells.translation: Year 22: Destroyed Yu and Guo. Chong Er fled to Di.
654 BC
Year 32: Led the feudal lords to attack Zheng.
Year 23: Yi Wu fled to Liang.

cells.content: 十八伐許，許君肉袒謝，楚從之。
cells.translation: Year 18: Attacked Xu; the Xu ruler bare-chested apologized; Chu followed it.
653 BC
652 BC
Year 25: Xiang Wang was established; feared Tai Shu.
Year 25: Attacked Di, because of Chong Er.

cells.content: 三十公疾，太子茲父讓兄目夷賢，公不聽。
cells.translation: Year 30: The duke was ill; Crown Prince Zi Fu yielded to elder brother Mu Yi's worthiness; the duke did not listen.
Cao Gong Gong, first year
651 BC
Year 1 of King Xiang: Feudal lords established the king.

cells.content: 九齊率我伐晉亂，至高梁還。
cells.translation: Year 9: Qi led us to attack Jin's chaos, reached Gao Liang and returned.

cells.content: 三十五夏，會諸侯于葵丘。天子使宰孔賜胙，命無拜。
cells.translation: Year 35: Summer, assembled the feudal lords at Kui Qiu. The Son of Heaven sent Steward Kong to grant the thigh meat, commanded no bowing.

cells.content: 二十六公卒，立奚齊，里克殺之。及卓子。立夷吾。
cells.translation: Year 26: The duke died; established Xi Qi; Li Ke killed him. And Zhuo Zi. Established Yi Wu.
Year 9: Yi Wu sent Xi Rang to bribe and seek entry.

cells.content: 三十一公薨，未葬，齊桓會葵丘。
cells.translation: Year 31: The duke died; not yet buried, Qi Huan assembled at Kui Qiu.
650 BC

cells.content: 三十六使隰朋立晉惠公。
cells.translation: Year 36: Sent Xi Peng to establish Jin Hui Gong.

cells.content: 晉惠公夷吾元年誅里克，倍秦約。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Hui of Jin (Yi Wu): Executed Li Ke, violated Qin treaty.
Year 10: Pi Zheng Zi Bao fled and came.

cells.content: 宋襄公茲父元年目夷相。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Xiang of Song (Zi Fu): Mu Yi became chancellor.
649 BC

cells.content: 三戎伐我，太叔帶召之。欲誅叔帶，叔帶奔齊。
cells.translation: Year 3: The Rong attacked us; Tai Shu Dai summoned them. Wanted to execute Shu Dai; Shu Dai fled to Qi.
Year 11: Saved the king and attacked the Rong; the Rong left.
Year 23: Attacked Huang.

cells.content: 二十四有妾夢天與之蘭，生穆公蘭。
cells.translation: Year 24: Had a concubine who dreamed Heaven gave her orchids; gave birth to Mu Gong Lan.
648 BC

cells.content: 三十八使管仲平戎于周，欲以上卿禮，讓，受下卿。
cells.translation: Year 38: Sent Guan Zhong to pacify the Rong in Zhou; wished to use upper minister ritual, declined and received lower minister.
Year 4: 15.
Year 1: 0.
647 BC
Jiaxu

cells.content: 三十九使仲孫請王，言叔帶，王怒。
cells.translation: Year 39: Sent Zhong Sun to request the king, spoke about Shu Dai; the king was angry.
Year 4: Famine; requested grain; Qin gave to us.

cells.content: 十三丕豹欲無與，公不聽，輸晉粟，起雍至絳。
cells.translation: Year 13: Pi Bao wanted not to give; the duke did not listen; transported Jin grain; rose from Yong to Jiang.
Year 1 of Duke Mu of Chen (Kuan).
646 BC
Year 5: Qin had famine; requested grain; Jin violated the agreement.
Year 26: Destroyed Liu and Ying.
645 BC

cells.content: 十五五月，日有食之。不書，史官失之。
cells.translation: Year 15: Fifth month, there was a solar eclipse. Not recorded; the historians omitted it.
Year 6: Qin captured Hui Gong and re-established him.

cells.content: 十五以盜食善馬士得破晉。
cells.translation: Year 15: Used bandits who ate good horses to defeat Jin.
Cai Zhuang Hou Jia Wu, first year
644 BC

cells.content: 四十二王以戎寇告齊，齊徵諸侯戍周。
cells.translation: Year 42: The king reported Rong invasion to Qi; Qi summoned the feudal lords to defend Zhou.

cells.content: 七重耳聞管仲死，去翟之齊。
cells.translation: Year 7: Chong Er heard Guan Zhong died; left Di and went to Qi.
Year 16: Established officials for Hedong.

cells.content: 七隕五石。六鷁退飛，過我都。
cells.translation: Year 7: Five stones fell. Six phoenixes retreated flying, passed over our capital.
Fourteenth year.
643 BC
Seventeenth year.
Fifteenth year.
642 BC
Tenth year.
Qi Xiao Gong Zhao, first year
Eighteenth year.
Sixteenth year.
641 BC
Eleventh year.

cells.content: 十九滅梁。梁好城，不居，民罷，相驚，故亡。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year: extinguished Liang. Liang was fond of city walls, did not reside in them; the people were exhausted, startled each other, therefore perished.
Seventeenth year.
640 BC
Twelfth year.
Twentieth year.
Eighteenth year.
639 BC
Thirteenth year.
Twenty-first year.

cells.content: 三十三執宋襄公，復歸之。
cells.translation: Thirty-third year: seized Song Xiang Gong, released him again.
Twelfth year: summoned Chu alliance.
Nineteenth year.
638 BC
Fourteenth year: Shu Dai returned again to Zhou.
Fifth year: returned the king's younger brother Dai.
Thirteenth year: Crown Prince Yu was hostage in Qin, fled and returned.
Twenty-second year.
Thirteenth year: battle of Hong, Chu defeated the duke.
Tenth year.
Thirty-fifth year: the duke went to Chu, Song attacked us.
Twentieth year.
637 BC
Jiashen
Fifteenth year.
Sixth year: attacked Song because they did not join the alliance.
Fourteenth year: Yu was established as Hui Gong.

cells.content: 二十三迎重耳於楚，厚禮之，妻之女。重耳願歸。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year: welcomed Chong Er from Chu, treated him with great courtesy, married him to a daughter. Chong Er wished to return.
Thirty-fifth year: Chong Er passed through, treated him with great courtesy.
Fourteenth year: the duke died ill from the Hong battle.

cells.content: 二十三重耳從齊過，無禮。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year: Chong Er came from Qi and passed through, was disrespectful.
Eleventh year.

cells.content: 十六重耳過，無禮，僖負羈私善。
cells.translation: Sixteenth year: Chong Er passed through, was disrespectful; Xi Fu Ji privately befriended him.

cells.content: 三十六重耳過，無禮，叔詹諫。
cells.translation: Thirty-sixth year: Chong Er passed through, was disrespectful; Shu Zhan admonished.
Twenty-first year.
636 BC
Sixteenth year: the king fled to Si. Si was Zheng territory.

cells.content: 晉文公元年誅子圉。魏武子為魏大夫，趙衰為原大夫。咎犯曰「求霸莫如內王。」
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Wen of Jin: Executed Zi Yu. Wei Wu Zi became Wei grand master, Zhao Cui became Yuan grand master. Jiu Fan said "For seeking hegemony, nothing is better than bringing in the king."
Twenty-fourth year: used troops to assist Chong Er.
Song Cheng Gong Wang Chen, first year
Twelfth year.
Twenty-second year.
635 BC
Seventeenth year: Jin installed the king.
Twenty-fifth year: wished to bring in the king, army on the Yellow River.
Thirteenth year.
Twenty-third year.
634 BC
Eighteenth year.
Third year: Song submitted.
Twenty-sixth year.
Third year: violated Chu alliance, became close to Jin.
Wei Cheng Gong Zheng, first year
Fourteenth year.
Twenty-fourth year.
633 BC

cells.content: 十孝公薨，弟潘因衛公子開方殺孝公子，立潘。
cells.translation: Year 10: Xiao Gong died; younger brother Pan, because of Wei Gongzi Kai Fang, killed Xiao Gong's son and established Pan.
Year 4: Saved Song; repaid the shame of Cao and Wei.
Year 2: 17.
Year 39: Sent Zi Yu to attack Song.
Year 4: Chu attacked us; we reported emergency to Jin.
Year 2: 15.
632 BC
Year 20: The king hunted at He Yang.
Year 28: The duke went to Jian Tu for audience.

cells.content: 齊昭公潘元年會晉敗楚，朝周王。
cells.translation: Qi Zhao Gong Pan, first year. Assembled Jin defeated Chu, courted Zhou king.

cells.content: 五侵曹伐衛，取五鹿，執曹伯。諸侯敗楚而朝河陽，周命賜公土地。
cells.translation: Year 5: Invaded Cao attacked Wei, took Wu Lu, seized Cao Bo. Feudal lords defeated Chu and courted He Yang; Zhou command granted duke land.
Year 28: Assembled Jin attacked Chu courted Zhou.
Year 40: Jin defeated Zi Yu at Cheng Pu.
Year 5: Jin saved us; Chu troops left.

cells.content: 三晉伐我，取五鹿。公出奔，立公子瑕會晉朝，復歸衛。
cells.translation: Year 3: Jin attacked us, took Wu Lu. Duke fled; established Gongzi Xia assembled Jin courted, returned to Wei.
Year 16: Assembled Jin attacked Chu, courted Zhou king.
Year 14: Assembled Jin attacked Chu, courted Zhou king.

cells.content: 二十一晉伐我，執公，復歸之。
cells.translation: Year 21: Jin attacked us, seized duke, returned him.
Year 2: 16.
631 BC
Year 2: 11.
Year 2: 19.
Year 4: Jin allied Wei with Song.
Year 1 of Duke Gong of Chen (Shuo).
Year 2: 17.
630 BC

cells.content: 七聽周歸衛成公。與秦圍鄭。
cells.translation: Year 7: Heard Zhou returned Wei Cheng Gong. Together with Qin surrounded Zheng.
Year 30: Surrounded Zheng; when spoken to, left.
Year 5: Zhou installed Cheng Gong, restored Wei.

cells.content: 四十三秦、晉圍我，以晉故。
cells.translation: Year 43: Qin and Jin surrounded us, because of Jin.
Year 2: 18.
629 BC
Year 2: 13.
Year 3: 11.
628 BC
Year 9: Wen Gong died.

cells.content: 三十二將襲鄭，蹇叔曰不可。
cells.translation: Year 32: Was about to raid Zheng; Jian Shu said it was not possible.
Year 45: Wen Gong died.
627 BC
Jiawu
Year 33: Xi Gong died.
Year 6: The Di invaded us.

cells.content: 晉襄公驩元年破秦于殽。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Xiang of Jin (Huan): Defeated Qin at Xiao.
Year 33: Raided Zheng; Jin defeated us at Xiao.

cells.content: 鄭穆公蘭元年秦襲我，弦高詐之。
cells.translation: Zheng Mu Gong Lan, first year. Qin raided us; Xian Gao deceived them.
626 BC
Lu Wen Gong Xing, first year
Year 2: Attacked Wei; Wei attacked us.

cells.content: 三十四敗殽將亡歸，公復其官。
cells.translation: Year 34: The Xiao defeated generals returned; the duke restored their offices.

cells.content: 四十六王欲殺太子立職，太子恐，與傅潘崇殺王。王欲食熊蹯死，不聽。自立為王。
cells.translation: Year 46: The king wanted to kill the crown prince and establish Zhi; the crown prince was afraid and together with tutor Pan Chong killed the king. The king wanted to eat bear paw and die, but they did not listen. Self-established as king.
Year 9: Jin attacked us; we attacked Jin.
625 BC
Year 3: Qin avenged our Xiao defeat; defeated us at Wang.

cells.content: 三十五伐晉報殽，敗我于汪。
cells.translation: Year 35: Attacked Jin to avenge Xiao; defeated us at Wang.

cells.content: 楚穆王商臣元年以其太子宅賜崇，為相。
cells.translation: Year 1 of King Mu of Chu (Shang Chen): Granted his crown prince's residence to Chong, made him chancellor.
624 BC
Year 3: The duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 四秦伐我，取王官，我不出。
cells.translation: Year 4: Qin attacked us, took Wang City; we did not go out.

cells.content: 三十六以孟明等伐晉，晉不敢出。
cells.translation: Year 36: With Meng Ming and others attacked Jin; Jin did not dare come out.
Year 2: Jin attacked us.
623 BC
Year 5: Attacked Qin, surrounded Mai and Xin City.

cells.content: 三十七晉伐我，圍邧、新城。
cells.translation: Year 37: Jin attacked us, surrounded Mai and Xin City.
Year 3: Destroyed Jiang.
Year 12: The duke went to Jin.
622 BC

cells.content: 六趙成子、欒貞子、霍伯、臼季皆卒。
cells.translation: Year 6: Zhao Cheng Zi, Luan Zhen Zi, Huo Bo, Jiu Ji all died.
Year 4: Destroyed Liu and Liao.
621 BC

cells.content: 七公卒。趙盾為太子少，欲更立君，恐誅，遂立太子為靈公。
cells.translation: Year 7: The duke died. Zhao Dun as crown prince was young, wanted to establish different ruler, feared execution, so established crown prince as Ling Gong.

cells.content: 三十九繆公薨。葬殉以人，從死者百七十人，君子譏之，故不言卒。
cells.translation: Year 39: Mu Gong died. Buried with human sacrifices; those who died with him were 170 people; the gentleman criticized it, so not said 'died'.
620 BC

cells.content: 晉靈公夷皋元年趙盾專政。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Ling of Jin (Yi Gao): Zhao Dun monopolized the government.
Qin Kang Gong Ying, first year
Year 17: Gong Sun Gu killed Cheng Gong.
619 BC
Year 33: Xiang Wang died.

cells.content: 八王使衛來求金以葬，非禮。
cells.translation: Year 8: The king sent Wei to request gold for burial; it was not ritual.

cells.content: 二秦伐我，取武城，報令孤之戰。
cells.translation: Year 2: Qin attacked us, took Wu City, avenged Ling Gu's battle.

cells.content: 宋昭公杵臼元年襄公之子。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Zhao of Song (Chu Jiu): Son of Duke Xiang.
618 BC
King Qing, first year
Year 3: Led the feudal lords to save Zheng.
Year 8: Attacked Zheng because they served Jin.
Year 10: Chu attacked us.
617 BC
Jia Chen.

cells.content: 四伐秦，拔少梁。秦取我北徵。
cells.translation: Year 4: Attacked Qin, took Shao Liang. Qin took our Bei Zheng.

cells.content: 四晉伐我，取少梁。我伐晉取北徵。
cells.translation: Year 4: Jin attacked us, took Shao Liang. We attacked Jin and took Bei Zheng.
Cao Wen Gong Shou, first year
Yan Huan Gong, first year
616 BC

cells.content: 十一敗長翟于鹹而歸，得長翟。
cells.translation: Year 11: Defeated Chang Di at Xian and returned, obtained Chang Di.
Year 4: Defeated Chang Di at Chang Qiu.
615 BC

cells.content: 六秦取我羈馬。與秦戰河曲，秦師遁。
cells.translation: Year 6: Qin took our Ji Ma. Fought Qin at He Qu; Qin army retreated.

cells.content: 六伐晉，取羈馬。怒，與我大戰河曲。
cells.translation: Year 6: Attacked Jin, took Ji Ma. Angry, fought us great battle at He Qu.
614 BC
Year 7: Obtained Sui Hui.
Year 7: Jin deceived and obtained Sui Hui.
613 BC

cells.content: 六頃王崩。公卿爭政，故不赴。
cells.translation: Year 6: Qing Wang died. Nobles contended for government, so did not announce.

cells.content: 十四彗星入北斗，周史曰：七年，宋、齊、晉君死。
cells.translation: Year 14: Comet entered Beidou. Zhou historian said: In the seventh year, the rulers of Song, Qi, and Jin died.

cells.content: 二十昭公卒。弟商人殺太子自立，是為懿公。
cells.translation: Year 20: Zhao Gong died. Younger brother Shang Ren killed crown prince and self-established, was Yi Gong.

cells.content: 八趙盾以車八百乘納捷菑，平王室。
cells.translation: Year 8: Zhao Dun with 800 chariots installed Jie Kui, pacified the royal house.
Chu Zhuang Wang Lu, first year
Chen Ling Gong Ping Guo, first year
612 BC
Year 1 of King Kuang.

cells.content: 十五六月辛丑，日蝕，齊伐我。
cells.translation: Year 15: Sixth month Xin Chou, solar eclipse; Qi attacked us.
Qi Yi Gong Shang Ren, first year
Year 9: We entered Cai.
Year 34: Jin attacked us. Zhuang Hou died.
Year 6: Qi entered our outer wall.
611 BC
Year 2: Did not obtain the people's hearts.
Year 1: 0.
Year 3: Destroyed Yong.

cells.content: 九襄夫人使衛伯殺昭公。弟鮑立。
cells.translation: Year 9: Xiang Furen made Wei Bo kill Zhao Gong. Younger brother Bao established.
Cai Wen Hou Shen, first year
610 BC
Year 17: Qi attacked us.
Year 3: Attacked Lu.
Year 11: Led the feudal lords to pacify Song.

cells.content: 宋文公鮑元年昭公弟。晉率諸侯平我。
cells.translation: Song Wen Gong Bao, first year. Zhao Gong's younger brother. Jin led feudal lords to pacify us.
609 BC

cells.content: 十八襄仲殺嫡，立庶子為宣公。
cells.translation: Year 18: Xiang Zhong killed the legitimate heir and established concubine son as Xuan Gong.

cells.content: 四公刖邴歜父而奪閻職妻，二人共殺公，立桓公子惠公。
cells.translation: Year 4: The duke cut off Bing Shou Fu's feet and took Yan Zhi's wife; the two together killed the duke and established Huan Gongzi as Hui Gong.
608 BC

cells.content: 魯宣公俀元年魯立宣公，不正，公室卑。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Xuan of Lu (Bei): Lu established Duke Xuan, but it was improper, the ducal house declined.

cells.content: 齊惠公元元年取魯濟西之田。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Hui of Qi (Yuan): Took land west of the Ji from Lu.
Year 13: Zhao Dun saved Chen and Song, attacked Zheng.
Year 1 of Duke Gong of Qin (He).

cells.content: 六伐宋、陳，以倍我服晉故。
cells.translation: Year 6: Attacked Song and Chen because they broke their service to Jin.

cells.content: 三楚、鄭伐我，以我倍楚故也。
cells.translation: Year 3: Chu and Zheng attacked us because we broke Chu.

cells.content: 二十與楚侵陳，遂侵宋。晉使趙盾伐我，以倍晉故。
cells.translation: Year 20: Together with Chu invaded Chen, then invaded Song. Jin sent Zhao Dun to attack us because we broke Jin.
Year 1: 0.
607 BC
Jia Yin.
Year 6: King Kuang died.
Year 2: Prince Cheng Fu defeated the Chang Di.

cells.content: 十四趙穿殺靈公，趙盾使穿迎公子黑诈于周，立之。趙氏賜公族。
cells.translation: Year 14: Zhao Chuan killed Ling Gong; Zhao Dun sent Chuan to welcome Gongzi Hei Yu from Zhou and establish him. Zhao family granted ducal clan status.

cells.content: 四華元以羊羹故陷於鄭。
cells.translation: Year 4: Hua Yuan because of the lamb stew matter was trapped in Zheng.

cells.content: 二十一與宋師戰，獲華元。
cells.translation: Year 21: Fought with Song army and captured Hua Yuan.
606 BC
Year 1 of King Ding.
Jin Cheng Gong Hei Yu, first year. Attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 八伐陸渾，至雒，問鼎輕重。
cells.translation: Year 8: Attacked Lu Hun, reached Luo, asked about the tripods' weight.
Year 5: Ransomed Hua Yuan; he fled and returned. Surrounded Cao.
Year 12: Song surrounded us.
Year 22: Hua Yuan fled and returned.
605 BC

cells.content: 九若敖氏為亂，滅之。伐鄭。
cells.translation: Year 9: The Ruo Ao clan made chaos; destroyed them. Attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 鄭靈公夷元年公子歸生以黿故殺靈公。
cells.translation: Zheng Ling Gong Yi, first year. Gongzi Gui Sheng because of the turtle matter killed Ling Gong.
604 BC

cells.content: 三中行桓子荀林父救鄭，伐陳。
cells.translation: Year 3: Zhong Xing Zi Xun Lin Fu saved Zheng and attacked Chen.

cells.content: 十楚伐鄭，與我平。晉中行桓子距楚，救鄭，伐我。
cells.translation: Year 10: Chu attacked Zheng and made peace with us. Jin Zhong Xing Zi resisted Chu, saved Zheng, and attacked us.

cells.content: 鄭襄公堅元年靈公庶弟。楚伐我，晉來救。
cells.translation: Zheng Xiang Gong Jian, first year. Ling Gong's concubine younger brother. Chu attacked us; Jin came to save.
603 BC
Year 4: Together with Wei invaded Chen.
Year 1 of Duke Huan of Qin.
Year 32: Together with Jin invaded Chen.
Year 11: Jin and Wei invaded us.
602 BC
601 BC
Year 8: Seventh month, solar eclipse.

cells.content: 六與魯伐秦，獲秦諜，殺之絳市，六日而蘇。
cells.translation: Year 6: Together with Lu attacked Qin, captured Qin spy, killed him in Jiang market; after six days he revived.
Year 3: Jin attacked us and captured spy.
Year 13: Attacked Chen and destroyed Shu Liao.
Year 13: Chu attacked us.
Year 1 of Duke Xuan of Yan.
600 BC

cells.content: 七使桓子伐楚。以諸侯師伐陳救鄭。成公薨。
cells.translation: Year 7: Sent Zi Han to attack Chu. With feudal lords' army attacked Chen to save Zheng. Cheng Gong died.

cells.content: 十四伐鄭，晉郤缺救鄭，敗我。
cells.translation: Year 14: Attacked Zheng; Jin Xi Que saved Zheng and defeated us.

cells.content: 五楚伐我，晉來救，敗楚師。
cells.translation: Year 5: Chu attacked us; Jin came to save and defeated Chu army.
Sixth year: defeated the Rong at Jin.
599 BC
Year 14: Lunar eclipse.

cells.content: 十公卒。崔杼有寵，高、國逐之，奔衛。
cells.translation: Year 10: The duke died. Cui Shu was favored; Gao and Guo drove him out; he fled to Wei.

cells.content: 晉景公據元年與宋伐鄭。
cells.translation: Jin Jing Gong Ju, first year. Together with Song attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 衛穆公鸱元年齊崔杼來奔。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Mu of Wei (Chi): Cui Shu of Qi came fleeing.

cells.content: 十五夏徵舒以其母辱，殺靈公。
cells.translation: Year 15: Xia Shi Shu because of his mother's disgrace killed Ling Gong.
Year 6: Jin, Song, Chu attacked us.
598 BC
Qi Qing Gong Wu Ye, first year

cells.content: 十六率諸侯誅陳夏徵舒，立陳靈公子午。
cells.translation: Year 16: Led feudal lords to punish Chen Xia Shi Shu and establish Chen Ling Gongzi Wu.

cells.content: 陳成公午元年靈公太子。
cells.translation: Year 1 of Duke Cheng of Chen (Wu): Crown prince of Duke Ling.
597 BC
Jiazi
Year 1: 0.
Year 3: Saved Zheng but was defeated by Chu at He Shang.

cells.content: 十七圍鄭，鄭伯肉袒謝，釋之。
cells.translation: Year 17: Surrounded Zheng; Zheng Bo bare-chested apologized; released him.
Year 14: Attacked Chen.
Year 8: Chu surrounded us; we used humble words to resolve it.
596 BC
595 BC
Year 5: Attacked Zheng.
Year 19: Surrounded Song because of killing envoy.
Year 16: Killed Chu envoy; Chu surrounded us.
Year 23: Wen Gong died.
Year 10: Jin attacked us.
594 BC
Year 15: First taxed the fields.

cells.content: 六救宋，執解揚，有使節。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Year 6: Saved Song, seized Xie Yang who had envoy credentials. Qin attacked us.
Year 1: 0.

cells.content: 二十圍宋。五月，華元告子反以誠，楚罷。
cells.translation: Year 20: Surrounded Song. Fifth month, Hua Yuan told Zi Fan with sincerity; Chu withdrew.
Year 17: Hua Yuan informed Chu; Chu left.
Cao Xuan Gong Lu, first year
Year 11: Assisted Chu to attack Song and seized Xie Yang.
593 BC
Year 7: Sui Hui destroyed Chi Di.
592 BC
Year 17: Solar eclipse.

cells.content: 七晉使郤克來齊，婦人笑之，克怒，歸去。
cells.translation: Year 7: Jin sent Xi Que to come to Qi; women laughed at him; Ke was angry and returned.

cells.content: 八使郤克使齊，婦人笑之，克怒歸。
cells.translation: Year 8: Sent Xi Ke as envoy to Qi; women laughed at him; Ke was angry and returned.
Year 20: Wen Hou died.
591 BC
Year 18: Xuan Gong died.
Year 8: Jin attacked and defeated us.
Year 9: Attacked Qi to hostage Qiang; army stopped.
Year 23: Zhuang Wang died.
Cai Jing Hou Gu, first year
590 BC

cells.content: 魯成公黑肱元年春，齊取我隆。
cells.translation: Lu Cheng Gong Hei Rong, first year. Spring, Qi took our Long.
Chu Gong Wang Shen, first year
589 BC

cells.content: 二與晉伐齊，齊歸我汶陽，竊與楚盟。
cells.translation: Year 2: Together with Jin attacked Qi; Qi returned our Wen Yang but secretly allied with Chu.

cells.content: 十晉郤克敗公於鞍，虜逢丑父。
cells.translation: Year 10: Jin Xi Que defeated duke at Shan; captured Feng Chou Fu.
Year 11: Together with Lu and Cao defeated Qi.

cells.content: 二秋，申公巫臣竊徵舒母奔晉，以為邢大夫。冬，伐衛、魯，救齊。
cells.translation: Year 2: Autumn, Shen Gong Zi Wu Chen secretly stole Shi Shu Mu and fled to Jin to establish as Xing minister. Winter, invaded Wei, Lu, and saved Qi.

cells.content: 十一穆公薨。與諸侯敗齊，反侵地。楚伐我。
cells.translation: Year 11: Mu Gong died. Together with feudal lords defeated Qi and returned invaded land. Chu invaded us.
588 BC
Year 3: Assembled Jin, Song, Wei, Cao to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 十一頃公如晉，欲王晉，晉不敢受。
cells.translation: Year 11: Zhao Gong went to Jin; Jin was not respectful; duke wanted to break Jin and join Chu.

cells.content: 十二始置六卿。率諸侯伐鄭。
cells.translation: Year 12: Began to set six ministers. Led feudal lords to attack Zheng.
Song Gong Gong Xia, first year
Wei Ding Gong Zang, first year
Year 7: Attacked Zheng.
Year 17: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
587 BC
Jiaxu

cells.content: 四公如晉，晉不敬，公欲倍晉合於楚。
cells.translation: Year 4: Duke went to Jin; Jin was not respectful; duke wanted to break Jin and join Chu.
Year 13: Lu duke came; was not respectful.
Year 4: Zi Fan saved Zheng.

cells.content: 十八晉欒書取我氾。襄公薨。
cells.translation: Year 18: Jin Lun Shu took our Fan. Xiang Gong died.
586 BC
Year 20: King Ding died.

cells.content: 十四梁山崩。伯宗隱其人而用其言。
cells.translation: Year 14: Shan Mountain collapsed. Bo Zong hid his person and used his words.

cells.content: 五伐鄭，倍我故也。鄭悼公來訟。
cells.translation: Year 5: Attacked Zheng because we broke the agreement. Zheng Dao Gong came to sue.

cells.content: 鄭悼公費元年公如楚訟。
cells.translation: Zheng Dao Gong Fei, first year. Duke went to Chu to sue.
Yan Zhao Gong, first year
585 BC
King Jian, first year

cells.content: 十五使欒書救鄭，遂侵蔡。
cells.translation: Year 15: Sent Lun Shu to save Zheng and invaded Cai.
Year 7: Jin invaded us.

cells.content: 二悼公薨。楚伐我，晉使欒書來救。
cells.translation: Year 2: Dao Gong died. Chu invaded us; Jin sent Lun Shu to come save.
Wu Shou Meng, first year
584 BC

cells.content: 十六以巫臣始通於吳而謀楚。
cells.translation: Year 16: Began to connect with Wu.
Year 7: Attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 鄭成公睔元年悼公弟也。楚伐我。
cells.translation: Zheng Cheng Gong Zhao, first year. Dao Gong's younger brother. Chu invaded us.
Year 2: Minister Wu came to plot attacking Chu.
583 BC
Year 17: Restored Zhao Wu's field. Invaded Cai.
Year 9: Jin attacked us.
582 BC
Year 17: Qing Gong died.

cells.content: 十八執鄭成公，伐鄭。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Year 18: Arrested Zheng Cheng Gong and attacked Zheng. Qin invaded us.
Year 22: Attacked Jin.
Year 9: Saved Zheng. Winter, made alliance with Jin.

cells.content: 三與楚盟。公如晉，執公伐我。
cells.translation: Year 3: Allied with Chu. Duke went to Jin; arrested duke and attacked us.
581 BC
Year 10: Duke went to Jin for funeral; avoided mentioning it.
Qi Ling Gong Huan, first year
Year 4: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
580 BC
Jin Li Gong Shou Man, first year

cells.content: 二十四與晉侯夾河盟，歸，倍盟。
cells.translation: Year 24: Together with Jin duke crossed river and allied; returned and broke alliance.
579 BC
578 BC
Year 13: Assembled Jin to attack Qin.
Year 4: Attacked Qin.

cells.content: 三伐秦至涇，敗之，獲其將成差。
cells.translation: Year 3: Attacked Qin to Jing and defeated them; obtained their general Cheng Cha.
Year 26: Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
Year 11: Jin led us to attack Qin.
Year 17: Jin led us to attack Qin.
Year 7: Jin led us to attack Qin.
577 BC
Jiashen
Year 12: Ding Gong died.
Cao Cheng Gong Fu Chu, first year
576 BC
Year 15: Began to connect with Wu; assembled Zhong Li.

cells.content: 五三郤讒伯宗，殺之，伯宗好直諫。
cells.translation: Year 5: Three Xi slandered Bo Zong and killed him; Bo Zong was good at straightforward admonition.
Qin Jing Gong, first year
Year 15: Xu feared Zheng and requested to move to Ye.
Year 13: Hua Yuan fled to Jin and returned.
Wei Xian Gong Gan, first year
Year 2: Jin seized our duke and returned.
Year 10: Together with Lu assembled at Zhong Li.
575 BC

cells.content: 十六宣伯告晉，欲殺季文子，文子得以義脫。
cells.translation: Year 16: Xuan Bo announced Jin; wanted to kill Ji Wen Zi but Wen Zi escaped with righteousness.
Year 6: Defeated Chu at Yan Ling.

cells.content: 十六救鄭，不利。子反醉，軍敗，殺子反歸。
cells.translation: Year 16: Saved Zheng but was unfavorable. Zi Fan was drunk; army defeated and killed Zi Fan who returned.
Song Ping Gong Cheng, first year

cells.content: 十倍晉盟楚，晉伐我，楚來救。
cells.translation: Year 10: Broke Jin alliance with Chu; Jin invaded us; Chu came to save.
574 BC
Year 13: Zhao Gong died.
573 BC
Year 18: Cheng Gong died.

cells.content: 八欒書中行偃殺厲公，立襄公曾孫，為悼公。
cells.translation: Year 8: Lun Shu Zhong Xing Di killed Li Gong and established Xiang Gong's grandson as Dao Gong.
Year 18: For Yu Shi attacked Song Peng Cheng.
Year 3: Chu attacked Peng Cheng; enfeoffed Yu Shi.
Year 12: Together with Chu attacked Song.
Yan Wu Gong, first year
572 BC
Year 14: Jian Wang died.

cells.content: 魯襄公午元年圍宋彭城。
cells.translation: Lu Xiang Gong Wu, first year. Surrounded Song Peng Cheng.

cells.content: 十晉伐我，使太子光質於晉。
cells.translation: Year 10: Invaded us; made Crown Prince Guang hostage to Jin.
Year 1 of Duke Dao of Jin: Besieged Song's Pengcheng.
Year 19: Invaded Song; saved Zheng.

cells.content: 四楚侵我，取犬丘。晉誅魚石，歸我彭城。
cells.translation: Year 13: Jin invaded and defeated us; army at Yi Shang; Chu came to save.
Year 5: Surrounded Song Peng Cheng.

cells.content: 十三晉伐敗我，兵次洧上，楚來救。
cells.translation: Year 13: Jin attacked and defeated us; army at Yi Shang; Chu came to save.
571 BC
Year 1 of King Ling: Born with beard.
Year 2: Assembled Jin to build Hu Lao.
Year 2: Led feudal lords to attack Zheng and built Hu Lao.
Year 2: 11.

cells.content: 十四成公薨。晉率諸侯伐我。
cells.translation: Year 14: Cheng Gong died. Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
570 BC
Year 3: Wei Jiang insulted Yang Gan.

cells.content: 二十一使子重伐吳，至衡山。使何忌侵陳。
cells.translation: Year 21: Sent Zi Zhong to attack Wu, reached Heng Shan. Sent He Qi to invade Chen.
Year 29: Broke Chu alliance; Chu invaded us.
Zheng Xi Gong Yun, first year
Year 16: Chu attacked us.
569 BC
Year 4: Duke went to Jin.

cells.content: 四魏絳說和戎、狄，狄朝晉。
cells.translation: Year 4: Wei Zhao advised uniting Rong and Di; Di courted Jin.
Year 22: Attacked Chen.
Year 30: Chu attacked us. Cheng Gong died.
Year 2: 13.
568 BC
Year 5: Ji Wen Zi died.
Year 23: Attacked Chen.
Chen Ai Gong Ruo, first year
Year 2: 14.
567 BC
Jiawu
Year 2: 14.
Year 2: 15.
566 BC
Year 25: Surrounded Chen.
Year 3: Chu surrounded us; duke fled and returned.

cells.content: 五子駟使賊夜殺釐公，詐以病卒赴諸侯。
cells.translation: Year 5: Zi Shu made traitor night kill Xi Gong and falsely announced illness to feudal lords.
565 BC
Year 8: Duke went to Jin.
Year 26: Attacked Zheng.
Year 27: Zheng invaded us.
Zheng Jian Gong Jia, first year. Xi Gong's son.
564 BC

cells.content: 九與晉伐鄭，會河上，問公年十二，可冠，冠於衛。
cells.translation: Year 9: Together with Jin invaded Zheng; assembled at river; asked duke's age - twelve, could be capped; capped at Wei.
Year 18: Together with Jin attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 九率齊、魯、宋、衛、曹伐鄭。秦伐我。
cells.translation: Year 9: Led Qi, Lu, Song, Wei, Cao to invade Zheng. Qin invaded us.
Year 13: Attacked Jin; Chu aided us.

cells.content: 二十七伐鄭，師于武城，為秦。
cells.translation: Year 27: Invaded Zheng; army at Wu City for Qin.
Year 12: Jin led us to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 十三晉率我伐鄭。師曹鞭公幸妾。
cells.translation: Year 13: Jin led us to invade Zheng. Cao whip duke enjoyed concubine.
Year 14: Jin led us to attack Zheng.

cells.content: 二誅子駟。晉率諸侯伐我，我與盟。楚怒，伐我。
cells.translation: Year 2: Punished Zi Shu. Jin led feudal lords to invade us; we allied with them. Chu was angry and invaded us.
563 BC
Year 9: Wang Shu fled to Jin.
Year 10: Chu and Zheng invaded our western border.

cells.content: 十九令太子光、高厚會諸侯鍾離。
cells.translation: Year 19: Ordered Crown Prince Guang and Gao Hou to assemble feudal lords at Zhong Li.

cells.content: 十率諸侯伐鄭。荀罃伐秦。
cells.translation: Year 10: Led feudal lords to invade Zheng. Xi Ying invaded Qin.
Year 14: Jin attacked us.
Year 28: Sent Zi Nang to save Zheng.
Year 13: Zheng attacked us; Wei came to save.
Year 14: Saved Song.

cells.content: 三晉率諸侯伐我，楚來救。子孔作亂，子產攻之
cells.translation: Year 3: Jin led feudal lords to invade us; Chu came to save. Zi Kong made chaos; Zi Chan attacked him.
562 BC

cells.content: 十一三桓分為三軍，各將軍。
cells.translation: Year 11: Three Huan divided into three armies; each led his army.

cells.content: 十一率諸侯伐鄭，秦敗我櫟。公曰：「吾用魏絳九合諸侯，」賜之樂。
cells.translation: Year 11: Led feudal lords to invade Zheng; Qin defeated us at Li. Duke said: 'My use of Wei Zhao united nine feudal lords,' granted him music.

cells.content: 十五我使庶長鮑伐晉救鄭，敗之櫟。
cells.translation: Year 15: We sent Chang Shu Shu to invade Jin and save Zheng; defeated them at Li.
Year 29: Together with Zheng attacked Song.
Year 14: Chu and Zheng attacked us.
Year 15: Attacked Zheng.

cells.content: 四與楚伐宋，晉率諸侯伐我，秦來救。
cells.translation: Year 4: Together with Chu invaded Song; Jin led feudal lords to invade us; Qin came to save.
561 BC
Year 12: Duke went to Jin.
Year 25: Shou Meng died.
560 BC

cells.content: 三十一吳伐我，敗之。共王薨。
cells.translation: Year 31: Wu invaded us; defeated them. Gong Wang died.
Wu Zhu Fan, first year. Chu defeated us.
559 BC
Year 14: Solar eclipse.
Year 23: Wei Xian Gong came fleeing.

cells.content: 十四率諸侯大夫伐秦，敗棫林。
cells.translation: Year 14: Led feudal lords ministers to invade Qin; defeated Bai Lin.

cells.content: 十八晉諸侯大夫伐我，敗棫林。
cells.translation: Year 18: Jin feudal lords ministers invaded us; defeated Bai Lin.

cells.content: 楚康王昭元年共王太子出奔吳。
cells.translation: Chu Kang Wang Zhao, first year. Gong Wang's Crown Prince fled Wu.

cells.content: 十八孫文子攻公，公奔齊，立定公弟狄。
cells.translation: Year 18: Sun Wen Zi attacked duke; duke fled Qi; established duke's younger brother Di.
Year 2: Ji Zi yielded position. Chu attacked us.
558 BC
Year 15: Solar eclipse. Qi attacked us.
Year 24: Attacked Lu.
Year 15: Dao Gong died.
Year 1 of Duke Shang of Wei (Di): Younger brother of Duke Ding.
557 BC
Jia Chen.

cells.content: 十六齊伐我。地震。齊復伐我北鄙。
cells.translation: Year 16: Qi invaded us. Earthquake. Qi again invaded our northern border.
Year 25: Attacked Lu.

cells.content: 晉平公彪元年我敗楚于湛阪。
cells.translation: Jin Ping Gong Biao, first year. We defeated Chu at Zhan Ban.
Year 3: Jin attacked us; defeated at Zhan Ban.
556 BC
Thirty-first year: attacked Lu.
Year 17: Qi attacked our northern border.
Year 26: Attacked Lu.
Year 20: Attacked Chen.
Year 3: Attacked Cao.
Year 13: Song attacked us.
Year 22: Wei attacked us.
Year 1: 0.
555 BC
Second year: attacked Lu.
Year 18: Together with Jin attacked Qi.
Year 27: Jin surrounded Lin Zi. Yan Ying.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：儒者斷其義，馳說者騁其辭，不務綜其終始；

translations.text: The Grand Historian says: The Confucians break off their meaning; the galloping explainers race their words; they do not strive to comprehensively understand the beginning and end.

sentences.zh: 歷人取其年月，數家隆於神運，譜諜獨記世謚，其辭略，欲一觀諸要難。

translations.text: The calendar makers take their years and months; several schools emphasize divine destiny; the genealogical records uniquely record posthumous names—their words are brief, making it difficult to get a comprehensive view.

sentences.zh: 於是譜十二諸侯，自共和訖孔子，表見春秋、國語學者所譏盛衰大指著于篇，為成學治古文者要刪焉。

translations.text: Therefore I have tabulated the twelve feudal lords, from the Gonghe era to Confucius, showing the rise and decline that scholars of the Spring and Autumn Annals and the Discourses of the States criticize, with the main points clearly set forth in this chapter, as an essential deletion for those who study and govern ancient texts.

The Grand Historian says: The Confucians break off their meaning; the galloping explainers race their words; they do not strive to comprehensively understand the beginning and end. The calendar makers take their years and months; several schools emphasize divine destiny; the genealogical records uniquely record posthumous names—their words are brief, making it difficult to get a comprehensive view. Therefore I have tabulated the twelve feudal lords, from the Gonghe era to Confucius, showing the rise and decline that scholars of the Spring and Autumn Annals and the Discourses of the States criticize, with the main points clearly set forth in this chapter, as an essential deletion for those who study and govern ancient texts.
